title: Gumby : a Gumby day
brief_description: Gumby, the worlds favourite clayboy invites you to join him and his friends Pokey the Horse, Prickle the dinosaur, and Goo the Blue Mermaid as they share eight fabulous new adventures: A Gumby day ; Strange circus animals ; A Cottage for Grammy ; The Musical ball ; Shrink-a-drink ; Hatching out ; Denali Blues ; The Fliver 500 race.
